title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Little Navmap - Updating the scenery library
description:
In this how to we are going to look at how you can update the scenery library when you are using MSFS 2020 i.c.w. Little Navmap. In addition to this we will look at the effect of disabling the NaviGraph - AIRAC which is by default enabled with the following setting: user NaviGraph for Navaids and Procedures.

Little Navmap can be downloaded from this site: https://www.littlenavmap.org/

The aircraft performance files referred to in the video can be downloaded from this site:
https://www.littlenavmap.org/downloads/Aircraft%20Performance/MSFS/
